ygData.subject: RE: Re: Archmage Answers
ygData.msgSnippet: Kit, You re not a great beer drinker? Does that mean you make a lot of mistakes while drinking? Well, as they say, practice makes perfect, and in the mean
ygData.messageBody:
Kit,

You're not a great beer drinker?

Does that mean you make a lot of mistakes while drinking? Well, as they say,
practice makes perfect, and in the mean time, it might help to wear a bib, I
guess.


Aranlas Starchaser
The Helpful Bard


-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W.
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Sent: 2/4/00 5:46 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Archmage Answers

From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>

Hey I like that one! I'm not a great beer drinker, but I'll always
drink a
great beer!

Kit

definitely cheering up fast

-----Original Message-----
From: Greg Gillan [mailto:GGillan@...]
Sent: Friday, February 04, 2000 10:48 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Archmage Answers


From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>

Think of it as being a glass of beer. Then the correct answer is not
"the
glass is half empty" or "the glass is half full". Instead its "half way
to
another beer". =D


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
Sent: Friday, February 04, 2000 12:38 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Archmage Answers


From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>

Hey, you try testing code all day! ;-) I just saw a programmer get the
ultimate insult. One of his coworkers just suggested that if he didn't
like
testing he could go work on EQ. Unfortunately my cube neighbor fell out
of
his chair he laughed so hard.

Besides, the glass is half empty cause all these bugs are driving me to
drink! Come to think of it, half a glass is getting close to being half
a
swallow! ;-)

Kit
Happy, just not happy with EQ!
